name: Specter Knight
info:
• 简体中文名: 幽灵骑士
  • 性别: 男
detail:
Formerly a thief and adventurer named Donovan, Specter Knight is one of eight Knights of the Order of No Quarter who serves the Enchantress and keeps watch over the Lich Yard.

Specter Knight also serves as the protagonist of Specter of Torment where he must recruit knights for the Enchantress to regain his life back.

jobs.name: Shovel Knight Showdown
jobs.nameCn: 铲子骑士究极巅峰决战
